function Node(row,col){return document.getElementById("node-".concat(row,"-").concat(col));}// Gets a node from the screen
export default function resetColors(height,width){//reset node colors in grid
for(var row=0;row<height;row++){for(var col=0;col<width;col++){Node(row,col).className="node";}}//reset colors of steps
for(var i=1;i<5;i++){document.getElementById("step".concat(i)).style.background="rgba(255, 0, 43, 0)";}document.getElementById("end").style.background="rgba(255, 0, 43, 0)";document.getElementById("Error").innerHTML="Total Water: 0 \n Water Level: 0";}
